description: NOTICE OF FILING OF OFFICIAL TRANSCRIPT of Motion Proceedings held on 02/26/2024, before Judge Debra C. Poplin. Court Reporter/Transcriber Terri Grandchamp, Telephone number 865-244-0454. NOTICE RE REDACTION OF TRANSCRIPTS: The parties have seven (7) calendar days to file with the Court a Notice of Intent to Request Redaction of this transcript. If no such Notice is filed, the transcript will be made remotely electronically available to the public without redaction after 90 calendar days. The policy is located on our website at http://www.tned.uscourts.gov/electronic-case-filing Transcript may be viewed at the court public terminal or purchased through the Court Reporter/Transcriber before the deadline for Release of Transcript Restriction. After that date it may be obtained through PACER.. Redaction Request due 3/25/2024. Redacted Transcript Deadline set for 4/4/2024. Release of Transcript Restriction set for 6/3/2024. (TSG) (Entered: 03/04/2024)

description: OPINION AND ORDER   re:  217     MOTION  to Dismiss Plaintiffs' Third Amended Complaint filed by Melissa A. Cobuzzi,   M & R Energy Resource Corp.,  231     MOTION  to Dismiss Plaintiffs' Third Amended Complaint  filed by Step hen  Wemple,   Consolidated Edison Solutions, Inc., Patrick  O'Gara,  221     MOTION  to Dismiss By The Constellation Defendants To Dismiss Plaintiffs Third Amended Complaint filed by Jody  Spaeth, Jeffrey S. Hills,   Constellation NewEne rgy, Inc.,  216     MOTION  to Dismiss  filed by   Municipal Electric and Gas Alliance, Incorporated,  228     MOTION  to Dismiss Third Amended Complaint filed by   EnergyNext, Inc. For the reasons stated above, the motions to dismiss o f Defendants Duthie, (Doc. 201), MEGA, (Doc. 216), Cobuzzi and M&R, (Doc. 217), Hills, Spaeth, and Constellation,  (Doc. 221), Boyd and EnergyNext, (Doc. 228), and O'Gara, Wemple, and ConEd, (Doc. 231), are GRANTED. Counts One, Five, Six, Seven  and Eight are dismissed with prejudice, and Counts Three, Four and Nine are dismissed without prejudice.  The Clerk of Court is directed to amend the caption as set forth in footnote  one, terminate the pending motions, (Docs. 201, 216, 217, 221, 228, 231), and close the case.    (Signed by Judge Cathy Seibel on 8/28/2017)  (mml)
